hook.text: An app adds points, badges, and leaderboards to learning. Engagement skyrockets. Learning? Not so much.

buildup.text: Gamification applies game mechanics to non-game contexts to boost motivation.

discovery.text: It increases time-on-task and initial engagement, but doesn't reliably improve actual learning outcomes.

twist.text: Students often optimize for points rather than understandingâ€”gaming the system instead of learning from it.

climax.text: The most effective educational games embed learning into the gameplay itself, not around it.

punchline.text: Engagement without depth is just entertainment.

quiz.question: What's the main problem with gamification in education?
options: Students optimize for points rather than genuine understanding
